record.id: field.name="part.no" and file.name="modelvendor" and term=NULL and format.name=NULL and syslanguage="en"
record.field.name: part.no
record.file.name: modelvendor

brief.brief: The unique ID of the item defined in the Model table that relates to this modelvendor record.
This field establishes the link between the model and modelvendor tables and is validated against the model table.

detail.detail: If the operator changes the Part No, all associated modelvendor records are automatically updated.
If the operator deletes a model record, all associated modelvendor records are automatically deleted.
copies an existing model record, a list of associated modelvendor records is displayed with the option of copying all or specific records.
